lead_paragraph: Tyrone van Aswegen on Saturday recorded his first ace on the PGA Tour, a shot that helped him edge within six stroke of third-round leader Bubba Watson.

headline.print_headline: Van Aswegen Hole-In-One Makes One Spectator Really Happy
headline.main: Van Aswegen Hole-In-One Makes One Spectator Really Happy
